== Alternatives ==
== Alternatives ==
  +
[[Image:Ultamatix.png|thumb|300px|[http://www.ultamatix.com/ Ultamatix] is the new alternative to automatix]]
Installing the package [[Ubuntu (operating system)#Availability of proprietary software|ubuntu-restricted-extras]], installs the most common "restricted" components a user might need (such as support for [[MP3]] and [[DVD-Video|DVD]] playback, Microsoft fonts, [[Java Virtual Machine|Java runtime environment]], [[Adobe Flash Player|Flash plugin]], common [[codec|codecs]], etc.).
Installing the package [[Ubuntu (operating system)#Availability of proprietary software|ubuntu-restricted-extras]], installs the most common "restricted" components a user might need (such as support for [[MP3]] and [[DVD-Video|DVD]] playback, Microsoft fonts, [[Java Virtual Machine|Java runtime environment]], [[Adobe Flash Player|Flash plugin]], common [[codec|codecs]], etc.).
